title: WTB: Both Johnson's, Young with Glove & Speaker

posts.post_title: WTB: Both Johnson's, Young with Glove & Speaker
posts.post_content:
I looking to purchase the following low grade cards: (Raw, 1, 2, 10, 20, Auth)

Walter Johnson, Hands at Chest
Walter Johnson, Portrait
Tris Speaker
Cy Young, With Glove

Thanks,

Matt

If you wouldn't mind coming up to a "3" I've got a dandy T206 Walter Johnson portrait for you. Better investment than a 2 or under for sure.
--Rob
